summary: Business Logic Flaw in Discount Application
description: Manipulate the application of discounts or coupons to receive a larger discount than intended, such as applying the same coupon multiple times or applying a percentage discount to a negative quantity.
instructions:
1. Add an item to the cart and apply a valid coupon.
2. Attempt to apply the same coupon again. If the discount is applied twice, document the flaw.
3. Alternatively, try adding an item with a quantity of -1 (negative one). Then apply a percentage-based discount. If the application gives you a credit instead of a discount, the logic is flawed. Document the steps to reproduce.
